attributes.additional_details: Asher Maslin murdered Hollie Gazzard in a frenzied attack. He was sentenced to life imprisonment with the Judge's recommendation that he serve a minimum of 24 years. I hereby petition the Home Secretary to ensure that his appeal against his sentence is rejected as I consider him to be a danger to the community.

rejection.details: This cannot be published as it refers to a specific court case. If you would like for this to be published, the best thing to do would be to write the e-petition in more general terms. (i.e if someone is convicted of this sort of attack they should not be able to appeal their sentence)
